title: Budget Buddy
description: A budgeting application for financial management. Budget Buddy helps users make informed financial decisions and stay on top of their finances with an intuitive, user-friendly interface.

title: Ascension Of The Forgotten
description: An interactive gaming experience. Dive into a story-driven adventure with immersive gameplay, unique characters, and challenging puzzles.

title: Animated Card
description: A modern animated card project featuring smooth transitions, interactive effects, and responsive design.
